title: The Keybind Wars: Which Key is Best for Flash?

replies.body: It's really quite simple. F is for Flash, and D is for Dexhaust, Dignite, Dteleport, Dheal, Dbarrier, Dcleanse, Dghost, Dsmite.
"It's really quite simple" D is for Dash F is for FIRE
D is for Flash because I like to flash my D
Logged in just to upvote
Except flash and dash have two totally different meanings. One can not dash through a skillshot and avoid it but one can flash over it.

The statistics are already there:

In NA high elo, 
~51% {{champion:119}} mains put flash on D because D stands for {{champion:119}} .
~46% {{champion:119}} mains put flash on F because F stands for {{champion:119}} .
~3% {{champion:119}} mains don't take flash because you don't question {{champion:119}} .

Hey @Riot how did you make that low poly/pixelated {{summoner:4}}  title image?  Trying to do something similar for a project for school.  Thanks.

Hey there! :D

I started off by loosely drawing the shapes of the Flash icon in Photoshop. From there, I used a triangle generator tool which randomly creates triangles in places where you click on the image. The more you click, the more triangles will spawn from that point. I focused larger triangles on the edges of the image and smaller triangles around the shapes of the figure. 

Once it got close to what I wanted, I used Illustrator to crop off the weird triangular edges and to fine tune (manually changing shapes and colors).

Good luck with your project! I'm happy to answer any other questions you have. :)
This is really awesome. I love seeing rioters take time out of their day to answer peoples problems even if it doesn't relate to league itself. New favorite rioter.

Since my fingers usually rest on QWE (pointer on E, middle on W, ring on Q) having flash on D is closer to my fingers, and more importantly right below the pointer, so it gives me a faster twitch reaction to a scenario.
What about {{summoner:4}} ulting on champions like {{champion:1}} ? You could F - R much easier then D - R, even though the differences in reaction time is less then a 10th of a secondd.
you can {{summoner:4}} {{champion:1}}  much easier and faster by using D-R because you can use your middle finger to flash and then your index finger to R

Ah, i put {{summoner:4}} on MB5 (My mouse has thumb buttons). So i don't realize the differences between putting {{summoner:4}} on D/F when it comes to {{summoner:4}} ulting.

https://www.google.com/search?q=bac+del+5+mouse&espv=2&biw=1648&bih=967&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjP2fG6oZHLAhWmw4MKHQ2YAB8Q_AUIBigB#imgrc=jFPAjGNRyp3kEM%3A {{summoner:4}}  is set to the thumb button on the right, my other summoner spell is set to D.

My mouse has 12 on the side, 3 on the top (4 if you count scroll wheel click), can bind macros to any of the buttons, and has 16,000 dpi.


I do not use it to its full potential. its too much power for 1 man alone.

This is also me ^
Flash is suppose to be a fast reaction or emergency. Always having it ready under my most comfortable finger to move around with makes it the perfect scenario for me.
